aima.core.util.math.geom.shapes

Class Rect2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • aima.core.util.math.geom.shapes.Rect2D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IGeometric2D

    public final class Rect2D
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGeometric2D
    This class implements a rectangle in a two-dimensional Cartesian plot that has its edges parallel to the axis of the plot.
    With this condition fast operations are possible for ray-casting and point-inside-testing.
    Author:
    Arno von Borries, Jan Phillip Kretzschmar, Andreas Walscheid

      • randomPoint

        public Point2D randomPoint()
        Description copied from interface: IGeometric2D
        Generates a random point that is on this geometric shape. isInsideBorder() has to return true for that point.
        Specified by:
        randomPoint in interface IGeometric2D
        Returns:
        a new random point inside the shape.

      • rayCast

        public double rayCast(Ray2D ray)
        Description copied from interface: IGeometric2D
        Intersects this geometric shape with a ray.
        Specified by:
        rayCast in interface IGeometric2D
        Parameters:
        ray - the ray to intersect.
        Returns:
        the length of the ray until it intersects with this shape. Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if it does not intersect this shape.
